title: Runes Page On Alpha
body: I can not find where i can buy more runes page for the alpha testers.{{champion:5}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3046}}

replies.body:
Make sure your sorting parameters on the left side (while in the Gameplay Tab) says *Show All*, as seen in the screenshot below:

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

I hope this helped!
